argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_nzrring | |- ( R e. NzRing -> R e. Ring ) |
| 2 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Unit ` R ) = ( Unit ` R ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 1r ` R ) = ( 1r ` R ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_1unit | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( 1r ` R ) e. ( Unit ` R ) ) |
| 5 | 1, 4 | #P_syl | |- ( R e. NzRing -> ( 1r ` R ) e. ( Unit ` R ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( invg ` R ) = ( invg ` R ) |
| 7 | 2, 6 | #P_unitnegcl | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ ( 1r ` R ) e. ( Unit ` R ) ) -> ( ( invg ` R ) ` ( 1r ` R ) ) e. ( Unit ` R ) ) |
| 8 | 1, 5, 7 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( R e. NzRing -> ( ( invg ` R ) ` ( 1r ` R ) ) e. ( Unit ` R ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 0g ` R ) = ( 0g ` R ) |
| 10 | 2, 9 | #P_nzrunit | |- ( ( R e. NzRing /\ ( ( invg ` R ) ` ( 1r ` R ) ) e. ( Unit ` R ) ) -> ( ( invg ` R ) ` ( 1r ` R ) ) =/= ( 0g ` R ) ) |
| 11 | 8, 10 | #P_mpdan | |- ( R e. NzRing -> ( ( invg ` R ) ` ( 1r ` R ) ) =/= ( 0g ` R ) ) |
